channel.title: I need help with my shops!
channel.description:
well i made a new shop for my new fishing guild i just made and everytime i try to play the server it says error??
or even if i try to add more items to the shop it says error
btw i'm using a 317

item.title: I need help with my shops!
item.dc:creator: @kneistol kneistol
item.description:
@kneistol wrote:

search for zeke and u should find something like this

[code]} else if (NPCID == 541) {

			// Zeke

			PutNPCCoords = true;

			WanneShop = 13; // Al-Kharid Scimitar Shop[/code]

copy that u got in client.java and paste it under… then in shops.cfg u added a wanneshopid
paste that in instead of 13

then u should have added a npc… just find the npc id and paste it in instead of the npc’id zeke…
and …

voila… u should have a nice custom shop

Read full topic
item.source: I need help with my shops!
